revolver.name: Revolver
revolver.text: The model is of revolver colt with some minor modifications. The design was mostly left intact as the main goal was to represent it in a standard fashion and research its intricacies.

blocks.text: Revolver is optimized in regards to polygon count, has UV map and textures which are not fully ‘backed’ (Blender has node system and permits live modifications on texture with render).
